text: Visitors to Mali must obtain a visa from one of the Malian diplomatic missions unless they come from one of the visa exempt countries.Venir au Mali, Ministère des Affaires Etrangères, de la Cooperation Internationale et de l'Intégration Africaine ==Visa policy map== Visa policy of Mali == Visa exemption == Citizens of the following countries and territories can visit Mali without a visa: {|style=" ; background-color: white; border: 1px solid white; padding: 5px;" |- style="vertical-align:top;" | * * (not listed by IATA) * * * (only listed by IATA) * * * * * * * * |valign=top| * * * * (not listed by IATA) * * * * * * * * (only listed by IATA) | |} {| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- !style="width:100%;";"|Date of visa changes |- | *30 April 1980: ECOWAShttp://investmentpolicyhub.unctad.org/IIA/treaty/3084 (Economic Community of West African States): Benin, Burkina Faso, Cape Verde, Ghana, Gambia, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Ivory Coast, Liberia, Niger, Nigeria, Senegal, Sierra Leone, Togo |- |} Holders of diplomatic and service category passports of Brazil, China, Cuba, Russia and Rwanda do not require a visa for 90 days. Nationals of any country with a diplomatic and service passports do not require a visa for up to 1 month. Nationals of China holding passports for public affairs do not require a visa for a maximum stay of 90 days. Visa exemption agreement for diplomatic, service, official passports was signed with South Africa but not yet ratified.https://africandailyvoice.com/en/2019/02/06/south-africa-and-mali- sign-reciprocal-l-visa-waiver-agreement/ ==Visa on arrival== Nationals of the following 2 countries may apply for a visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 3 months. Up until 9 March 2015, many countries were also eligible for visa on arrival: {|style=" ; background-color: white; border: 1px solid white; padding: 5px;" |- style="vertical-align:top;" | * * | |} ==Entry Refusal== Admission and transit is refused to nationals of , even if not leaving the aircraft and proceeding by the same flight. ==Visitor statistics== Most visitors arriving to Mali for tourism purposes were from the following countries of nationality:Statistiques sur le tourisme au Mali Annuaire 2014 p. 20-21 {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Country || 2014 || 2013 |- | || 31,580 || 21,717 |- | || 8,308 || 7,464 |- | || 7,632 || 6,432 |- | || 4,479 || 3,946 |- | || 3,793 || 3,402 |- | || 3,508 || 3,816 |- | || 3,201 || 2,687 |- | || 2,299 || 637 |- | || 2,036 || 1,582 |- | || 2,003 || 1,707 |- | Total || 110,529 || 85,315 |} ==See also== *Visa requirements for Malian citizens ==References== Category:Foreign relations of Mali Mali
title: Visa policy of Mali
